items.label: Core
items.Description: Core functionalities.

items.label: StandardFunctions
items.Description: Standard functions for common tasks. (Std extends Common)

items.label: Common
items.Description: General resource management tasks, focusing on actions like creating, modifying, and retrieving resources.

items.label: Automation
items.Description: Verbs that facilitate the automation of tasks and processes.

items.label: Cleanup
items.Description: Verbs that deal with the removal of unnecessary or temporary resources.

items.label: Communications
items.Description: Data transmission and communication, facilitating the exchange of information between sources and destinations.

items.label: GuiConfig
items.Description: Verbs related to setting up and managing configurations for resources.

items.label: Data
items.Description: Data manipulation and management, including actions for storing, transforming, and organizing data.

items.label: Devices
items.Description: Managing and inspecting devices.

items.label: Diagnostic
items.Description: Troubleshooting and diagnostics, aimed at examining resources to identify and resolve issues.

items.label: Forms
items.Description: Windows Systems Forms and related functionalities.

items.label: FileSystem
items.Description: File system (FS), storage, and I/O operations.

items.label: Lifecycle
items.Description: Management of resources throughout their lifecycle, covering actions related to deployment, approval, and state changes.

items.label: Monitoring
items.Description: Verbs focused on observing and tracking the performance or status of resources.

items.label: Network
items.Description: Anything network-related.

items.label: Remote
items.Description: Anything related to remote access and invocation.

items.label: Reporting
items.Description: Verbs related to generating reports or summaries of resource states and activities.

items.label: Security
items.Description: Access control and protection of resources, including actions for granting, blocking, and safeguarding access.

items.label: Shell
items.Description: Shell, process, invocation, command (cmd), and related verbs.

items.label: Validation
items.Description: Verbs that ensure the correctness or compliance of resources.

items.label: Other
items.Description: Other and special types.
